@Nonnull
public static BalanceFormatter get(@Nonnull
                                           String prefix)
Retrieves a valid CurrencyFormatter for the given prefix, even if one is not registered.

Parameters:
prefix - The account-prefix for the currency in question
Returns:
A CurrencyFormatter which can express the quantity and units of currency of this type

register

public void register(@Nonnull
                     String prefix,
                     @Nonnull
                     BalanceFormatter formatter)
Register a formatter for the specified currency account-prefix.

Parameters:
prefix - The account-prefix for the currency to register
formatter - A CurrencyFormatter which can turn amounts of this currency into a human-readable String
